runs.comm: fired onto the pads, Soumya slogs and does not connect
back of a length and outside off, solid punch to cover-point
angling into the pads, whipped straight to short midwicket
good length and on middle and leg, flicked to right of midwicket. Zim are off and running in Khulna

intent from Sibanda but he only connects with thin air. Length ball, holds its line outside off. Sibanda runs down the pitch, has a big whoosh and misses. I suspect that was a slower one from Mashrafe
back of a length and Al-Amin hits the deck hard. Blocked
Hamilton goes low and stretches across off, he lap-sweeps it over backward square leg
fuller length ball on off, the batsman flows forward and punches to mid-off
the bowler pulls his length back a touch outside off, flayed to short cover
width outside off, Sibanda frees his arms and nails the gap this time. He punches the short ball crisply through square point
back of a length, ducks back in sharply to catch the back thigh. That was too high and the lbw appeal is turned down quickly
Hamilton nips down the track, takes it from outside off and heaves it over mid-on
It does not matter! Fractionally short on off, heaved over midwicket now for back-to-back fours
pitched up and Mashrafe rolls his finger across this one outside off to mess with Hamilton's dinky dab. He plays early and gets beaten
back of a length, off-stump line, slapped to mid-off. Hamilton sets off for a single
back of a length on off, chopped in front of point
back of a length, this is outside off, jabbed straight down the ground. He did not time it pretty well, but it outruns the chasing fielder and finds the fence
short and angled in, Sibanda targets the leg side with a swipe. No dice. He is rapped on the back thigh. Impact outside off
length ball around off, pushed to point
Sibanda charges at the bowler. Al-Amin drags his length back outside off. Wild swing and a miss
Pitched up on middle, Sibanda shows the full face as he drives it back over the bowler's head with great authority. He freezes the pose...
drop and run in front of point. Sibanda is eager to pinch a single, but his partner sends him back
blockhole delivery on off, squirted to mid-on
arrows in with the angle, arm-ball, pushed down the ground. There is a slight mix-up but the pair scamper across for the single
slides in and hits the front pad but it was heading down leg
Hamilton now uses his feet, he did not get close enough to the pitch, but dragged it over mid-on
fumble from the diving short fine leg fielder. Leg-stump ball, lapped away with a roll of the wrists
darted down the leg side
slower and loopier on middle, dabbed with soft hands to point
flighted full ball on middle, Sibanda sees the flight and lofts it over the wide long-on boundary for a six!
full and angling away outside off from over the wicket, Hamilton loads up for a slog-sweep and toe-ends it behind to the keeper
full and outside off, slapped away past the covers for four

was that a cutter? Full and Mustafiz strikes the back pad of Hamilton. The batsman plays across the line and does not lay bat to it. Umpire Enamul Haque shakes his head. The impact may have been just outside off
pitched up, this is the cutter, chipped wide of short cover
back of a length and just a shade outside off, helped to third man
full and on middle, dropped defensively into the covers
diverted off the pads towards short fine leg
flat and fired on the legs, slog-swept away behind square
tossed up on middle, uppish drive to long-on
speared down leg, wide
full ball on off, driven smoothly to long-off
nudged off the pads through midwicket
flighted and outside off, eased to long-off for one more
length ball on middle, Sibanda swings across the line and skews it over the covers off a leading edge
another appeal for lbw from Mustafiz, not given again by umpire Enamul. Hamilton shuffles outside off and misses the sweep
straight in line, controlled chip over the midwicket region. Sibanda hares across for the second, beating the throw
clipped away off the pads for another single through midwicket
full and aimed at off, dropped defensively to cover
chopped from outside off to third man. Zim ticking along nicely. Tick, tick, tick...
skids on outside off, chopped through the vacant slip area for four
full on off, clipped to long-on
darted outside off, the batsman moves away outside leg and adjusts, dabbing to short third man
slides on quicker, punched out to midwicket
fired on middle, jabbed to long-on
Mahmudullah drops it short, rocked back and pulled over midwicket
slides in outside off, left alone. Sibanda thought it was a wide
slapped down the ground, to long-on
near yorker, jammed back to the bowler
legbreak, tapped to long-on for one more
Sabbir hits the blockhole, played back to the bowler
half-tracker outside leg and duly dispatched. Sibanda skips back and pulls over midwicket
Hamilton dances out, manufactures a full toss and whacks it over cow corner
Nurul belts out a big appeal for lbw! Pushed through, sweep and a miss. Hit outside the line of off
whipped off the pads through midwicket
Hamilton unfurls the reverse-sweep now. He goes low and finds the yawning gap behind point
slides on outside off, flayed to cover off the back foot. Tamim puts in a diving save
Mahmudullah held this one back, Hamilton waits and nudges a single behind point
drifts in on off, popped to the left of the diving bowler. Almost a return catch
Shakib gives this more flight, drilled to long-off
full and on off, belted to long-off
tossed up on middle and leg, lovely lofted hit for a one-bounce four to the long-on boundary

bobble, bobble, bobble, taken on the rebound? Tossed up on middle, swung away to long-on. Soumya is there by the edge of the boundary. The ball bobbles out on the first attempt, he secures on the rebound. But the momentum carries him over the ad hoarding. He realises that as he swats the ball into the field of play. He back-tracks, steadies himself to pouch it, but replays show that his foot had touched the hoarding. Sibanda gets a six!
reprieved and out next ball. Flighted full on middle, Sibanda wants to lift it over the leg side after stepping away outside leg. Instead he slices it with Tamim making no error
length ball on a fourth-stump line, tapped to sweeper cover
pulled away to deep midwicket for one. Hamilton reaches a fifty
good length and on off, pushed past cover on the back foot
fullish and outside off, he goes low and laps it over short fine leg. Good execution
full and on off, milked to long-on. They hustle for the second
full and outside off, whipped to long-on for two more. Excellent running
full and on middle, Waller makes swinging room and lofts it inside out over cover
non-turning ball on middle, pushed back to the bowler
legbreak, played into the covers on the back foot
Hamilton shows his ace early, the bowler shortens his length and raps the pad
slides on outside off, chopped to cover
Waller shuffles outside off, Sabbir pushes it straight. Hoisted straight down the ground
short ball on middle, swung away to deep midwicket
back of a length on middle, hit to third man
full on off, driven smoothly to long-off

Mashrafe pushes it too full on middle and leg, whipped through midwicket. There is a horrible mix-up on the second. Waller is caught short as the keeper gathers the throw from Sabbir and takes the bails off. A throw to the bowler's end could have had Hamilton. Such was the mix-up
full and on off, clipped in front of square
Hamilton jumps outside leg, the bowler follows him. The batsman still thumps it down the ground
down the pitch and driven to long-off
dangled up slower, played back to the bowler
Hamilton skips out, meets a full toss and bangs it to long-off
Raza uses his feet, gets too close to the pitch, but manages to whip a single to leg
Hamilton dances out again, he smashes Shakib over long-on
drifting down leg, helped down to short fine leg with a paddle sweep
cutter outside off, down the track. Swing and a miss
Hamilton manufactures room outside leg and drags a full ball to mid-on
Shakib's day has gotten worse! He shells a catch at mid-on! Fullish, cutter? Hamilton swings and skies it. Shakib back-tracks and makes a mess of the overhead catch. Shakib misjudged that badly
down the track and laced to long-off
yorker on middle and leg, whipped through square leg
Mustafiz nails another yorker, squeezed behind square on the leg side
Al-Amin hurls it full on off, jabbed to long-on
short ball on middle, smartly pulled over backward square leg
full and on off, hoicked towards cow corner off the inside half

Raza slithers across off for a lap-scoop, the bowler follows him. He does not connect properly and deflects it behind off the thigh before setting off. Nurul catches Hamilton short with an accurate over-arm throw
short and wide outside off, carved over short third man
speared on middle and leg, swung away to long-on
knocked em'over! Khulna finds its voice. Chigumbura steps out, shuffles across, and exposes all three stumps. Mustafiz nails the leg stump with a yorker
Mustafiz knocks out the middle stump now. Khulna roars again! Nice and full, Jongwe shapes for a reverse-slap and misses. Mustafiz does not miss, though
full and aimed at off, Williams blocks to cover and averts the hat-trick
full and on middle, pushed to the right of mid-off
back of a length cutter on off, spooned in front of point via a leading edge
yorker outside off, Williams can't lay bat on it. End of a fine effort from Mustafiz
Raza steps away, makes swinging room outside off. Al-Amin chases the moving batsman with a full toss. Swung straight down the throat of Mahmudullah at deep cover. Zim are falling away at the death
full and outside off, reverse-sweep and a miss
full toss on the leg stump, slogged to deep midwicket. Williams wants two, but has to settle with one
length ball on off, Moor sizes it up, and launches it over long-on, clears Soumya at long-on. He goes over the ad boards in vain
low full toss on off, cracked to deep cover
bowled'em! Williams shuffles across off, tunes up for reverse-sweep. He can only deflect it onto the stumps. The middle stump gets pegged back
